CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Pricing__c ) ,0,1)+ IF(ISBLANK( Bought_for_Bundle__c ) ,0,1)+ IF(ISBLANK( Service_Expectations_Not_Met__c ) ,0,1) + IF(ISBLANK( Product_Expecations_Not_Met__c ) ,0,1)+ IF(ISBLANK( Only_Wanted_H_B__c ) ,0,1)+ IF(ISBLANK( X90_Day_Sale__c ) ,0,1)+ IF(ISBLANK( Client_Not_Ready__c ) ,0,1)+ IF(ISBLANK(Other_Concerns__c), 0,1)
CustomField.label: Client Concern Count
